name: Rick
line: *points out the window* See that planet right there? Don’t fly too close to that planet. Someone’ll come out and try to wash your windshield. (Rick’s phone rings.) Hold on. *picks up* Yup. Yeah, I have it. Where do you wanna meet? Alright, cool. *hangs up* Alright Morty, lesson’s over. We got some business to attend to a few lightminutes south of here.

name: Jerry
line: Oh, you still use ‘south’ in space?

name: Rick
line: *startled* WHOA! Jesus, Jerry, what the hell are you doing here?!

name: Rick
line: I guess I remember that. *rubs forehead* Wow. And you’ve just been back there this whole time? Amazing. Well we don’t have time to take him to Earth, Morty. Head for 3124-917.

name: Jerry
line: *chuckles* Cool! Looks like I’m comin’ along for an adventure!

name: Rick
line: Nope. (An asteroid-like mass materializes before them.) This is. You can park in a handicapped spot, Morty. Anything with less than eight limbs is considered

name: Jerry-Sitter
line: Well look at this fella. *pinches Jerry’s cheek* Aren’t you handsome?

name: Jerry-Sitter
line: *as if speaking to a child* Oh, I know you are. Did you come here in a spaceship?

name: Jerry
line: I’m travelling with my son and father-in-law. Uh, wait, are they coming?

name: Pajama Jerry
line: I don’t know how this works!

name: Morty
line: *looking at a pamphlet* Jerryboree? You created a daycare for my dad?

name: Rick
line: You kidding? I wish I had this idea. Well… I did have this idea, but I wish I was the version of me that owned it. That guy’s rich.

name: Receptionist
line: Don’t forget to check the reason for your drop-off.

name: Rick
line: *checks off “Stowaway” and “Annoying me”* Trust me Morty, I’ve heard stories from other Ricks. Jerrys don’t tend to last five minutes off of Earth. This is a totally unregistered cross-temporal asteroid. Here they can romp and play with other Jerrys. It couldn’t be safer.

name: Rick
line: Hey Morty, hang onto this. That number’s your dad. If you lose it, we’re not gonna be able to get him back.

name: Rick
line: Don’t come with. It’s boring, it’s *burps* business stuff.

name: Morty
line: What kinda business do you do in a garage? You know, this seems a little shady.

name: Rick
line: Right, like nothing shady ever happened in a fully furnished office? You ever hear about Wall Street Morty? Y-You know what those guys do in th—in their fancy board rooms? They take their balls, and they dip ‘em in cocaine, and they wipe ‘em all over each other. You know, Grandpa goes around, and he does his business in public because Grandpa isn’t shady.

name: Rick
line: Ah, crap. *rolls down window* Hey, what’s up?

name: Krombopulos Michael
line: Hey, Rick! Haha! Here you go, three thousand Flurbos! D’you have the weapon?

name: Rick
line: Can… Can we please…? This is my grandson, Morty.

name: Krombopulos Michael
line: Well hi Morty! I’m Krombopulos Michael! I’m an assassin. I buy guns from your grandpa.

name: Rick
line: Ugh. *passes Krombopulos Michael a case containing the antimatter gun* Here, now go away.

name: Krombopulos Michael
line: *examines weapon* Ooh, yeah, this looks deadly. So this shoots

name: Rick
line: Y-Y-Y-You’re gonna give him your card?!

name: Krombopulos Michael
line: I have no code of ethics, I will kill anyone, anywhere! Children, animals, old people, doesn’t matter. I just love killin’!

name: Morty
line: …You sell weapons to killers for money?

name: Rick
line: Ugh… You’ve got what the intergalactic call a very planetary mindset, Morty. It’s more complicated out here! These are Flurbos. Do you understand what two humans can accomplish with three thousand of these?

name: Rick
line: An entire afternoon at Blips and Chiiiitz!

name: Rick
line: Aw, this place is the best. It’s got beer, games, prizes, and you can never tell what time it is.

name: Morty
line: You sold a gun to a murderer so you could play video games?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, sure, if you spend all day shuffling words around you can make anything sound bad, Morty. *puts a helmet on Morty’s head* Here, check this out.

name: Roy
line: I…had a nightmare. I was with an old man… He put a helmet on me.

name: Roy’s mother
line: It’s just a fever. Get some sleep, I don’t want you missing school on Monday. *walks out of the room and switches off the lights*

name: Teacher
line: I want you kids to look around you today and think about your future. (Roy looks outside and sees kids playing with a football. He smiles.) Now is the time in your life when anything is possible.

name: Announcer
line: Spiraling perfectly, it’s gonna be caught by Roy Parsons! Roy Parsons is at the 20! (Roy makes eye contact with a girl in the stands.) Now he’s at the 10! Nothing can stop Roy the Rocket! Touchdown!

name: Roy’s wife
line: I just think it’s time to get realistic. Have you talked to my father about the carpet store? Roy?

name: Doctor
line: Had we caught it sooner… Well, hindsight is 20-20, Roy. What’s important is that we move quickly.

name: Roy’s wife
line: *takes his hand* You’re not going to.

name: Customer
line: Hey, thanks for the carpet, Roy.

name: Voice
line: *shouting from off screen* Hey Roy, you pull those Persian off-white shags for the clearance sale?

name: Morty
line: Whoa! What the hell?! Wha—Where am I?! What the hell?!

name: Rick
line: Fifty-five years. Not bad, Morty. You kinda wasted your thirties though with

name: Rick
line: Morty. You were just playing a game. It’s called Roy. Snap out of it, come on. *hands him his tickets*

name: Morty
line: I’m Morty… You’re Rick… Hey, you sold a gun to a guy that kills people!

name: Morty
line: Don’t dodge the issue, Rick! Selling a gun to a hitman is the same as pulling the trigger!

name: Rick
line: It’s also the same as doing nothing. If Krombopulos Michael wants someone dead, there’s not a lot anybody can do to stop him. That’s why he does it for a living? Now if you’ll excuse me, it’s time to thrash your Roy score. *puts on the helmet*

name: Morty
line: You could stop this killing from happening, Rick! You know, y-you did a bad thing selling that gun, but you could undo it if you wanted!

name: Rick
line: Uh-huh, yeah, that’s the difference between you and me, Morty. I never go back to the carpet store.

name: Alien
line: *passing by, sees Rick playing Roy* Holy shit! This guy’s taking Roy off the grid! (Other alien patrons gasp and congregate around Rick.) This guy doesn’t have a social security number for Roy!

name: Jerry
line: Hi, I’m sorry, I think there was a misunderstanding. I’m an adult and would like to go home, please.

name: Jerry-Sitter
line: Well of course! Right through that tube. *points to a tube in the wall*

name: Jerry
line: *muttering to self* Unbelievable. *approaches the tube and starts climbing in*

name: Jerry
line: *indignantly* I know how to crawl in a tube. *to himself, while crawling* Ugh… Come on… This is harder than it looks… (Suddenly the tube transitions into a slide.) Whoooooaaaa!

name: Jerry
line: You guys are enjoying this? Don’t you feel a little… patronized?

name: Jerry
line: Oh, come on, this is ridiculous!

name: Daycare Beth
line: Who wants to come watch Midnight Run with director’s commentary on?

name: Daycare Beth
line: First one there gets to adjust the picture settings!

name: Jerry
line: The factory tint setting is always too high! *climbs out of the ballpit and hurries after “Beth” with the other Jerrys*

name: Another Jerry
line: The factory tint setting is always too high!

name: Michael
line: Oh boy, here I go killin’ again!

name: Morty
line: *dazed* All out of off-white Persians… *gets out of the ship and realizes he killed Krombopulos Michael* Oh man, wha-wh-wh-what have I done?! *picks up KM’s arm and the antimatter gun*

name: Gromflomite
line: (pointing a gun at Morty) Drop the gun!

name: Morty
line: You don’t understand! This guy was gonna kill someone!

name: Gromflomite
line: I guess that makes two of us. *fires up his weapon*

name: Rick
line: What are you doing Morty?! This is a Galactic Federation outpost! Look, I don’t have time to tell you my entire backstory, but Grandpa and government don’t get along!

name: Morty
line: Huh?! Are you Krombopulos Michael’s target? W-Wwwwhat’s your name?

name: Fart
line: My kind has no use for names. I communicate through what you call “Jessica’s feet.” No, “telepathy.”

name: Rick
line: Oh, good job, Morty. Y-Y-Y-You killed my best customer but you saved a mind-reading fart!

name: Fart
line: I like this name, ‘Fart.’ Morty, would you kindly release me by pulling that lever to the left of my cell? I am in great pain.

name: Rick
line: Morty, don’t do it. (Morty walks toward the lever.) Morty… (Morty glances at Rick before pulling the lever. Alarms start to sound as Fart escapes his cell.) Morty, you idiot!

name: Morty
line: Oh crap, let’s get you outta here!

name: Rick
line: We can’t get him outta here. He’s gaseous. He’s not gonna make it through a portal, Morty.

name: Morty
line: *stomps past Rick* Well then I guess we’re all getting in the car! Right, uh…

name: Morty
line: No! Jus-j-j-just get in the car!

name: Rick
line: Morty, come on, I-I wanna go back to Blips and Chitz. I don’t wanna deal with this!

name: Morty
line: Y-You’ve been clear on the fact that you don’t wanna help, so just go away!

name: Gromflomite
line: Get out of the vehicle made of garbage or we will open fire!

name: Morty
line: *still trying to start the car* Oh no no no!

name: Rick
line: Stupid-ass fart-saving carpet-store motherfucker! *shoves Morty out of the driver’s seat and takes the wheel* Move!

name: Rick
line: Wait, did you fuck with my seat settings?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, yeah. (He crashes the car into the Gromflomites before flying away from the outpost.)

name: Gearhead
line: Your geldon convertor is pretty dinged up.

name: Rick
line: That’s ‘cause my grandson drives like a male Obavradian. Yeah, I said it. Some stereotypes are based in fact.

name: Gearhead
line: Actually, it’s because of years of neglect. You really need to respect your gears, Rick. To you, they’re just wheels with teeth, but in my culture, wars have been fought, entire—

name: Rick
line: *interrupts him* So I’ve heard. Just fix it. *to Morty* I don’t think the Gromflomites can track us now, but it looks like we’re gonna be here for awhile. *lowers voice* Or, ya know, if you still have that gun K. Michael dropped, we can finish the job and go home.

name: Fart
line: You do understand I’m telepathic, right?

name: Morty
line: Rick, we’re taking him back where he belongs!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, where’s that? Are you going on a quest to find he who smelt it?

name: Fart
line: I came here accidentally through a wormhole located in what you call “get out of my head, Fart, I know you’re in here, la la la la—” No, in what you call the Promethean Nebula.

name: Rick
line: Oh great, just a hop, skip, and an 800 lightyear jump!

name: Morty
line: You know, you can leave any time you want, Rick.

name: Rick
line: *walks away, muttering* Whatever you wanna do you little punk-ass little bitch…

name: Fart
line: Thank you, Morty. You are not like other carbon-based life forms. You put the value of all life above your own.

name: Morty
line: That’s how things should be. It’s how they could be.

name: Fart
line: (singing over a montage formed from Morty’s imagination) The world can be one together / Cosmos without hatred / Stars like diamonds in your eyes. / The ground can be space (space, space, space, space) / With feet marching toward a peaceful sky. / All the moonmen want things their way / But we make sure they see the sun. / Goodbye, moonmen / You say goodbye, moonmen. / Goodby—

name: Rick
line: *holding a golf club* Shut the fuck up about moonmen! This isn’t a musical number. This

name: Random Jerry
line: *opens email and laughs* Duck, duck, birdie? (All Jerrys open emails and laugh.) Very funny!

name: Other Jerry
line: Hahaha! Oh, this place is great.

name: Jerry
line: I almost wish I could stay longer than one day.

name: Other Jerry
line: These are the Jerrys whose Ricks and Mortys never came back. (Forgotten Jerrys stand, sit, and lie around the room, generally looking despondent.) …They live here now.

name: Gear Anchor
line: No gear turnings as of yet in the curious case of these unidentified humanoid fugitives (An image of Rick and Morty in the car as Rick was adjusting the seat settings appears onscreen.) reportedly at large somewhere within the Gear System.

name: Rick
line: Son of a… *approaches Fart* Why were the Gromflomites holding you prisoner? What the fuck is so valuable about you?

name: Fart
line: I am no more valuable than life itself. However, I am able to alter the composition of atoms, like this. (An electric fuzz seems to go through the gaseous cloud and a lump of gold materializes, dropping to the ground beneath him.) That was oxygen. I added seventy-one protons to it.

name: Rick
line: *picks up the gold* Ah, terrific. The fart that pooped gold. No wonder every cop in the system is lookin’ for us! *pockets gold* Any species that gets a hold of this thing is gonna use it to take over the galaxy. Do you know how inconvenient that’s gonna be to my work?

name: Rick
line: Somebody dropped the dime on us. Gearhead… *turns around*

name: Gearhead
line: *pointing a gun at Rick* I’m sorry, Rick. The reward on your head is too high. And like you always say, you gotta look out for Number One.

name: Rick
line: Number One is me, asshole! You’re supposed to be my friend!

name: Gearhead
line: Friend? Do you even know my real name? It’s Revolio Clockberg Junior. I belong to an entire species of gear people. Calling me ‘Gearhead’ is like calling a Chinese person ‘Asia-face.’

name: Rick
line: Two things I wanna make clear to everybody in this room. Never betray me, and it’s time to go.

name: Rick
line: Hey Morty, remember when you said selling a gun was as bad as pulling the trigger? How do you feel about all these people getting killed because of your choices?

name: Paul
line: Don’t worry. I treat Beth very well, and I do not
